commands.description: list who has access to an app
commands.help:
[1mUsage:[22m heroku access [34m[flags][39m

[1mlist who has access to an app[22m

[34mFlags:[39m
 -a, --app APP        [2mapp to run command against[22m
 -r, --remote REMOTE  [2mgit remote of app to use[22m
 --json               [2moutput in json format[22m
helpLine: [2mlist who has access to an app[22m

commands.help:
[1mUsage:[22m heroku sharing:access

This command is now heroku access

commands.description: Add new users to your app
commands.help:
[1mUsage:[22m heroku access:add EMAIL [34m[flags][39m

[1mAdd new users to your app[22m

[34mFlags:[39m
 -a, --app APP              [2mapp to run command against[22m
 -r, --remote REMOTE        [2mgit remote of app to use[22m
 --permissions PERMISSIONS  [2mlist of permissions comma separated[22m

Examples:

    heroku access:add user@email.com --app APP # Add a collaborator to your app
    heroku access:add user@email.com --app APP --permissions deploy,manage,operate # permissions must be comma separated

[1mUsage:[22m heroku sharing:add

this command is now heroku access:add

commands.description: Remove users from your app
commands.help:
[1mUsage:[22m heroku access:remove EMAIL [34m[flags][39m

[1mRemove users from your app[22m

[34mFlags:[39m
 -a, --app APP        [2mapp to run command against[22m
 -r, --remote REMOTE  [2mgit remote of app to use[22m

Example:

    heroku access:remove user@email.com --app APP

[1mUsage:[22m heroku sharing:remove

this command is now heroku access:remove

commands.description: Update existing collaborators in an org app
commands.help:
[1mUsage:[22m heroku access:update EMAIL [34m[flags][39m

[1mUpdate existing collaborators in an org app[22m

[34mFlags:[39m
 -a, --app APP              [2mapp to run command against[22m
 -r, --remote REMOTE        [2mgit remote of app to use[22m
 --permissions PERMISSIONS  [2mcomma-delimited list of permissions to update (deploy,manage,operate)[22m

Example:

    heroku access:update user@email.com --app APP --permissions deploy,manage,operate
helpLine: [2mUpdate existing collaborators in an org app[22m

[1mprevent organization members from joining an app[22m

[34mFlags:[39m

commands.description: transfer applications to another user or team
commands.help:
[1mUsage:[22m heroku apps:transfer RECIPIENT [34m[flags][39m

[1mtransfer applications to another user or team[22m

RECIPIENT  [2muser or team to transfer applications to[22m

[34mFlags:[39m
 -a, --app APP        [2mapp to run command against[22m
 -l, --locked         [2mlock the app upon transfer[22m
 -r, --remote REMOTE  [2mgit remote of app to use[22m
 --bulk               [2mtransfer applications in bulk[22m

Examples:

    $ heroku apps:transfer collaborator@example.com
    Transferring example to collaborator@example.com... done

    $ heroku apps:transfer acme-widgets
    Transferring example to acme-widgets... done

    $ heroku apps:transfer --bulk acme-widgets
    ...
helpLine: [2mtransfer applications to another user or team[22m

commands.help:
[1mUsage:[22m heroku sharing:transfer

this command is now heroku apps:transfer
